mapper.select: select pid, mid, pname, pkind, pbirth, pgender, pfile, psfile from pcp_pet where mid=#{mid} order by pid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PCP_PET (PID,MID,PNAME,PKIND,PBIRTH,PGENDER,PFILE,PSFILE) VALUES ('P_'||LTRIM(TO_CHAR(SEQU_PCP_PET_PID.NEXTVAL,'0000')), #{mid},#{pname},#{pkind},#{pbirth},#{pgender}, #{pfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
